name: Garnier BB Cream
short_description:
Every since BB cream has hit the market, which has become very popular, given the fact that they can act as a moisturizer, foundation or tinted moisturizer, concealer and primer. BB Balm or stain came from Australia for patients who have undergone surgery or skin. After that I became quite a craze in Korea. Korean actresses swear by BB creams and how they behave like a miracle in a single product for their skin.
Given the increasing popularity of almost all the skin care and cosmetic brands have launched over their own version of BB cream is now known as the balm of beauty.
Maybelline launched their BB cream in India about 9 months ago in three different colors to choose from. I have reviewed Maybelline BB cream so now I know what they are and what to expect from Garnier BB cream.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0MDfw3zCE20
